Title: Silverlight MultiSelectComboBox
Description: A multi-select combobox for Silverlight (hope this gets included in the toolkit at some time)
HomeWiki: I've been trying to find a MultiSelectComboBox for Silverlight, I have only found bit and pieces... I have put together pieces of all the snippets (sorry for not mentioning names, there are many and I didn't keep track) and it seems to be working ok for our purposes, hope someone can make it better...
